评论详情: The suit is very flattering for mid section.  I tie the straps  a little tight for support but it does put some pressure on your neck .

This suit is exactly as pictured.  The fabric is a vibrant red with bright white dots.  An important point to consider is that it is definitely proportioned for a woman with a short torso.  The bust is padded and the design at the legs is flattering, not high cut.

Really liked the fit of this suit.  The top really supported the girls well and the ruching help camouflage belly.  It had good compression.  It was just enough cleavage reveal to feel sexy but covered.
I have this in more than 1 colors. I love everything about it. The material is nice and comfortable and not see thru or thin. I love the style. It’s a very slimming style which is why I LOVE IT.
I ordered up a size and still couldn't get it on! Beautiful color,  I wish it had fit. Ordered 3x, I  am 5'7" and 238 pounds.

To be honest, I love the swimsuit. I'm 5'9" 210lbs, 45 bust, 40 waist, and 46 hips. It fits perfectly everywhere but my bust. Now, don't get me wrong, I know you can tighten it around your neck to get better support. Thats not my problem. My bra size is a 38G so I have a small band size compared to my cup size. This is a common problem and I usually end up just dealing with it or finding some way to make the "band" smaller, ie. a safety pin on either side. I'm definitely buying again and keeping this one but I think I'll try sizing down to see if that helps. Otherwise it fits perfectly but I don't feel any compression in the stomach area so keep that in mind.

I’m 5’9 and 143lbs. I usually wear a medium or small depending on the brand. I’m tall & muscular, and my body fat percentage is 10.8%. I bought one size up because I read reviews about this suit that it runs small. It definitely does!!! I should have bought an XL instead of the L, even though I usually wear a medium. The suit doesn’t fully fit around my booty and the halter feels tight around my neck. My torso is a bit too long for this size. Wish I would have purchased 2 sizes up/XL.

评论概述: Smooths curves nicely, tummy control okay
评论详情: Not a super tight bathing suit and the tummy control is pretty good. If you are buying solely for tummy control, it might not be exactly what you’re looking for. (All things considered, compared to other suits, it’s pretty good re flattening— definitely much better than the average suit.)  However, it nicely smooths curves and has excellent coverage. The shape itself is very flattering and the material is good— seems pretty durable. I’m approx 130 lbs and 5’5”, 34 C and the medium fit excellently. The silhouette is awesome for a classy suit that is also functional and cute!

Cute design, comfortable, and fits well with good coverage, but very little ”tummy control” and would have preferred more padding in the chest. Haven’t tried it swimming yet, so not sure how it will fit after it gets wet.
Bust size not comfortable
Nice color and style but I am returning it. The torso length is too short on me and not comfortable.

I wanted something after having a baby and I love the way this fits. It’s such a beautiful bright red. Makes me feel really good when I have it on. Also, I wore it during my second pregnancy and was surprised how it’s been holding up. Great buy!
I wore this is Puerto Vallarta and someone asked me if it was a designer piece. Perfect fit. Perfect size. Perfect aesthetic.
Didn’t think it would work or do what it says, but I was surprised! The swimsuit is cute & it gives your tummy a little hug to make you look slimmer!
Still kind of big for a small.  Decided to keep it for swim class.

I've always bought expensive swimwear from Dillards to feel good in. Unfortunately, it's Dec and we are going to Mexico in 2 weeks and I needed a new swimsuit so I gave amazon a try and bought 4 different suits that were high rated for medium coverage tummy control. This is only one I kept. It truly had the material quality, tummy control and overall great look. It really did compliment my shape. Very impressed with this find. I'm 5'4 and 150lbs. Love this suit and so did my hubby.
this is a regular swimsuit, no tummy control whatsoever
I loved everything about this swimsuit! The color, fit and style. I would buy this again. The value for the price is exceptional.
Love the swimsuit. Looks really good
Fits great! Holds in my 34DD boobs. Love it so much I bought 4 colors.

This swimsuit is very flattering and made me feel so confident in it. I don't like to show too much so this was perfect. If you're concerned about tummy control this is the perfect swimsuit. It's comfy and can double as an outfit top. Highly recommend.
Good
Super cute and comfy but the halter top means no support. Wish it had traditional straps.
This suit is flattering on a curvy body, but it doesn’t exactly snatch the waist. I’d recommend sizing down and taking out the removable cups. The green floral print is beautiful!
Doesn't look the same on me as it does the model. Oh well.
Much too small and color way too vibrant loud
Beautiful swimsuit, bought the red but has no shimmer like in the photo Fit really well
Nice fit and like the brand
The twist part is a little weird but it’s fine. The suit fits great and is exactly what I was wanting.

评论概述: I loved everything about this swimsuit
评论详情: The fit and color were perfect.
Super cute and flattering.  Need more solid color options.
True to size and great color.  However, the purple is muted and not neon.

评论概述: Doesn’t control, but is very nice
评论详情: This bathing suit is great.  It’s a great, vibrant color. It’s comfortable, and washes nicely.  It’s not a tummy control, but the ruching of the fabric is a good little cover.

评论概述: Used so often I won’t get another year
评论详情: The color and neck
I loved the fit of this bathing suit. I was looking for something that would make my tummy look flatter, and this did so! It fit so snug and was comfortable to move and swim in.
Was to big and froppy......order waa received in good time.

Camed packaged shoved in a plastic zippered bag with the shipping label stuck on it. Nothing to keep anyone from opening it. The material looked super cheap and already had pilling and damaged fabric. Also not at all flattering which was unusual because I've owned this type of cut before and it's looked fabulous. Just your usual Amazon trash, I would look elsewhere. Search CupShe brand it was much nicer for a one piece

This swim suit fits perfectly. It has a very flattering cut, it's very comfortable, has great coverage in the bottom. The adjustable halter top makes it fit a variety of body styles. The lining is very soft. The material is thick and has great elasticity. The color selection is also incredible.  However, I'm about 6' tall. I have a longer-than- average torsoe, and no discernable cleavage. I have to really pull on the halter to get the coverage I need up top, sometimes putting a bit of a strain on my neck.
This suit ran very short in the torso.

评论概述: Totally different than what I ordered
评论详情: The bathing suit fit fine and the fabric was okay. But the pattern was different, huge mini mouse kinda polka dots and the colors were brighter. I kinda like it, but if you want tiny polka dots and a darker red, this ain't it.
Fabric is of good quality and sewn well. Good purchase- pleased with it and the price. It is true to navy color.

评论概述: It ran a little big, but it’s good
评论详情: I was looking for a larger top, bathing suit
I’ve gotten compliments on this suit. Wears well, stays bright after washing and only one time did my boob pop out, and that was because of a really intense ocean wave that knocked everyone down.
So so tiny, im a 40c and this was made for like no chest or meat whatsoever girlies
I think this would be cuter on someone thinner with a bigger chest lol if you have a large stomach the colors stretch and dull, and the chest gets baggy
Fits great and keeps you tucked in at the right places. Very flattering and the material is sturdy yet stretchy with compression. Highly recommend.

评论概述: Unflattering and the ruching is odd
评论详情: I'm 5'4 (162cm) and 155lbs (70kg) and I originally bought the small. It was TOO small (it flattened my breasts) so I got the medium and it's too big! I guess they don't have a size that works for me. The color is vibrant and the shipping was fast and arrived in good condition. Giving it two stars because I think the ruching looks AWFUL. On both sizes I had.

I liked the print a lot on this suit. But I ended up returning it because the torso felt short, and I have an average torso length. Also the cups of the suit were very far into the center and even loosing the halter I felt like I couldn't move or bend over without an accidental showing happening .
Fit well. Lots to compliments
Comfortable. Enjoyed the look
The color is a deep blue, exactly how it is presented.  It fits even better than I hoped! Perfect.
I ordered this, and several more expensive, suits and this was my favorite out of all of them. I loved the color and fit. It was the best value and cut of all of them.
Heading to a pool party this weekend and decided to purchase a new bathing suit. I absolutely love this piece. It fits perfectly and the tummy control is AMAZING! I highly recommend this item!!!
Loved it! Bought to wear yo a 4th of July pool party. Fit great and very comfortable!
Returning the suit. I ordered the recommended size and could barely breathe. Poor bottom coverage although the bottom felt loose. Order a size larger. Pretty suit otherwise.

评论概述: I like the material and the quality!
评论详情: I swim three/four times a week in a lap pool, and this bathing suit fits me perfectly. It's comfortable and elegant cut.
Loved it!  super cute!  I recently lost 45 lbs and was not sure how it would fit.  It  keeps you tucked in all the right places!

This bathing suit is so cute and the medium fit me great. Although the first time I wore it and sat on edge of the pool and noticed it was piling! It got easily damaged just sitting down. Also, when I got the suit it has a beautiful vibrant color but after two uses the color faded.

This bathing suit is so cute! Highly recommend. Holds the stomach area great, the straps are comfortable. For the price it is definitely worth it! The front cut is so flattering even for me with a smaller chest. The material is comfortable too. It is a little short on my torso but other then that it’s great!
I bought this on a whim.  I wasn't really sure about the color, But I really like it.  I like the halter top and LOVE the color.  Have lots of compliments.
The suit was well made and flattering. Used it 2-3 times a week this summer and never faded.
Material feels super cheap and does not fit as described.

评论概述: Decent tummy help but lack of breast support
评论详情: Post C-section, I was looking for a suit that helped pull in and conceal my still-loose abdomen (posf 6-week scar checkup after being cleared to swim, but still within months of giving birth, dealing with the slow process of ab separation and scar shelf with loose tummy skin needing more assistance to control belly than pre-pregnancy situation).  This helped conceal and sinch tummy "ENOUGH" (looked decent but still not perfect), but the chest area lacks support and shape. After breastfeeding made my breast tissue less perky, I needed a top to hold them up. This suit kind of just lets them fall flat with little ability to perk them up bc there's no under-boob wire or band for support, deeming the straps useless outside of keeping suit on.
Did not look like I thought it would. I returned this suit because the top did not look good.
Fits well. Color great. Comfy

评论概述: Looks great on, but Disappointed in quality
评论详情: See the 3 pictures. The first two are after wearing only twice. The 3rd picture is what the fabric should look like. The suit is very pretty and a retro look, but the bottom is ruined. The white picks are white fabric picked/pulled through the dark fabric from when I sat down in the pool and hot tub. The return window closed a few days ago, so I can't return it.

评论概述: If you are busty get it XL
评论详情: Let me start off by saying I’m will definitely be ordering other colors…I am 5”5 170 and I wear 40H in my bras it’s very hard for me to find swimsuits that fits my girls lol This swimsuit fits perfect my girls looks amazing and it’s also a lot of support you can tie it up to your liking…

I have 3 of these suits and love them all!  I'm  5'4" - 145 lbs. Medium build - use them daily at pool - rinse after each use on shower and no color fade.  Best swim suits I have ever bought in all of my 76 years.  Use them daily - sometimes twice {is why I have 3} - weather permitting.  Also love that I can untie top when sunbathing and have no strap untanned lines.
Su color todo es exacto para mujer con caderas super!!! cubre perfectamentw
Perfect fit and true to size!
Very good could be tighter in the stomach area

评论概述: High quality, flattering, and sizing is accurate to what company has listed.
评论详情: Looks and feels like an expensive suit! I tried on a suit that was $290 & very similar style (except this one’s color is much nicer).  This suit feels like the expensive one and the green and navy colors are so rich and gorgeous of shades that I could not be happier with this purchase.  I followed the size guide measurements listed from the company (length, waist, bra size, etc) rather than size assignments (size M 8-10) & the suit fits perfectly. I feel it is very flattering on me as well.  I am 5’8 and 163 lbs for reference. I ordered a large because i felt I’d need the extra length vs the mediums length and the suit fits great! I have so far been using the straps but I could go strapless & it would be ok. With the straps on the suit is extremely comfortable & easy to be in for long periods. I found the suit comfortable in the water and out.  I’ve also washed it several times (hung to dry. Did not use dryer) & so far it’s held up.  10/10 recommend.

评论概述: Extremely cute, flattering, and sizing is correct
评论详情: I don't really know what else to say about it other than I'm happy with my purchase. It's a cute, vibrant swimsuit. Highly recommend. (Review about "Smismivo Tummy Control Swimwear Halter One Piece Swimsuit Ruched Padded Bathing Suits for Women Slimming Vintage Bikini (Yellow, Small)")
This bathing suit fits so well and has good tummy control. I bought in multiple colors!
Cute and flattering. True to size.
Felt it needed more of a lift for those with bigger chests

Color is good and looks cute but it runs large so ordered a smaller size. Not very much tummy control and the bra band seems weak. I ordered a large because of the bust sizing but can fit into the smaller medium size. Wish the tummy control was tighter though.

评论概述: Best all around swim suit for teen!
评论详情: There's nothing you or your daughter won't love about this one piece. My teen absolutely loves the color, fit, style, and comfort of this suit. She usually has a difficult time finding one pieces for camp because either they are too tight lengthwise and the straps dig into the tops of her shoulders or they ride up the backside.  But this is perfect for longer torsos. She said she was complimented consistently and I have no complaints regarding the modesty. The cheeks and girls are covered, so this is 5 stars from me.

Defintely not a fan.  I ordered two. One smelled so bad, even after washing it with soap in the washing machine I jad to throw it away. The other was fine-ish -- but the material is so thick it takes forever to dry. It took two days hanging in a drafty bathroom before it finally was dry.  In this instance you get what you pay for -- regrets only.

Love this swimsuit.  Always get compliments, very flattering for almost all body types.  The tummy control isn't very controlling, but the ruching makes it appear so.  Love it so much, I sadly left one at an event, so I purchased another.
I got the red. It holds you in, the suit is adorable. It's very comfortable to wear, and dries quickly when wet. I really love this suit!
This bathing suit is very comfortable. It gave me the right amount of support all around, but I didn't feel like I couldn't breathe. And the animal print was the edginess I desired.

I chose this bathing suit because I liked how it looked, the colors, and I got it and the first time I went swimming I hated it. When you put it on, the padding and everything is wonderful on the bathing suit but once you get it wet you almost need help to get it pulled off of you. Not very good when you are swimming and have to get out and go to the restroom and get it down and then get it back up over you. The color did not fade but it was just too weighty when you got it wet and not easy to get up and down. I did have the correct size.
Perfect if you have curves

Just bathing suit is great for larger busted women. I've had a lot of trouble buying bathing suits in the past but these ones in particular fit well I just didn't like the style. The padding is good the quality is good.
The flimsy tie was not enough at all to support my boobs

Two things I don’t like are 1) it’s a bit loose across the top, not because the sizing is off, but because of how it’s made. If I lean over or to the side I have to put my hand over my heart like the pledge of allegiance to keep me covered. 2) I also don’t like having to tie it around my neck. I would have rather had over the shoulder straps. The tie behind the neck might be why the front stays loose.
This is the most comfortable swimsuit I have had in years! Love the color and the fabric. Fits me great!

Surprisingly good quality! Bought just to have one-piece to wear under mesh cover-up, but ended up wearing it all the time as main bathing suit. Even has Spanx-type smoothing capabilities. You do need to wash it twice when you get it bc it smells like fish right out of little plastic bag (I just used Tide). Weird, I know, but saw TikTok video about Amazon clothes having this issue, so wasn’t too bothered by it.
During my first time wearing this bathing suit the item started to show fuzzies all over ! Not happy with material at all
Good quality love the fit and helps with tummy control bought it in a couple of different colors.

i love this suit!  And I am officially old with figure flaws (apple shape and softened breasts).  I exercise in the water as opposed to swimming.  Recently wore out a zipper-front, chlorine resistant suit that gave me years of wear and my money's worth, but I was so tired of it!  Love the bright, cheery yellow, the classic "bathing beauty" styling, and the fit.  Leg openings are a little higher than I have been selecting, but it's okay.  True to size (14 in my case).  First time in years that I have not dreaded wearing a bathing suit - that is high praise indeed!  My concern going in was that the halter tie would loosen in the water while dancing to Oldies, but no!  I tied a double knot instead of a bow and The Girls were secure.  The built-in bra support is so much better than other suits - a welcome change.  I know the suit will have a short life in the chlorinated  pool, but I'm fine with ordering another one in a different color. Only worn once so can't comment on fading or wear at this point.
Just what I was looking for!  Great coverage on cheeks and flattering strap that toes behind neck.  Great fit!  Would buy again.
This fits great. I usually don't buy a swimsuit online. But I am glad I bought this one. It's great.

The bathing suit fits nicely, but the elastic in the legs is not strong enough. The bathing suit rides up rather than staying in place. Because the elastic is so loose it makes the suit very comfortable  but not very flattering and made me feel very self-conscious since I have to constantly be pulling it down.

After reading reviews from woman my size and weight it helped me know what size to order since I haven’t bought a new bathing suit in years and the one I have doesn’t fit me properly anymore.I like that the cut out for hips was good, don’t like high cuts.  It fit the upper portion too, perfectly.  I am very pleased with the purchase.
Precioso, buena calidad.

评论概述: Not enough support for my chest
评论详情: Fits great but lacks support for your breast
Size is true....love that it has some tummy control....ordered size small

Really love this swimsuit and that it’s really flattering for the most part. Love the tummy control/cinching.  The only thing preventing this from getting 5 stars is the boob area. The padding and padding area is too narrow and looks unnatural. You can even see it in some of the review photos.
